headline: Bloom Energy, Oklo Stocks Slide as Analysts Question Gains
summary: Bloom Energy  and  Oklo  two companies whose shares had more than tripled this year coming into this week, were down sharply on Thursday.  Bloom fell 4.8% and Oklo dropped 9.3% in early trading.  Bloom makes fuel cells that look like massive refrigerators and can generate electricity on-site at data centers, hospitals, or other businesses.
